G

generateID() - Method in class dataManagment.DMComponent
This method will randomly generate an id for a Shareholder and will also ensure that the id is not currently in use by any Shareholder active or inactive.
geSharePrice() - Method in class objects.Shares
Getter: returns the price at which the Shares were bought.
getAction() - Method in class menuClases.Option
Returns the action Executed by the selection of this option.
getActivity() - Method in class objects.Shareholder
Getter: returns if user is active or not

Returns the menu in Question

This method will Call the menu in question
getAdministrationOfStocksMenu() - Static method in class menuClases.AdministrationOfStocksMenu
Getter: Returns the Menu in question.
getCompanyName() - Method in class objects.Company
Getter: Returns this Company's Name.
getComponent() - Static method in class inputOutput.IOComponent
Getter: returns static object of this class to execute methods for this class.
getDescription() - Method in class menuClases.Option
Returns the name of the option.
getIdnum() - Method in class objects.Shareholder
Getter: Returns the id of the Shareholder
getInput(String) - Method in class inputOutput.IOComponent
This method will output a message to the console and return user input to the console.
getMainMenu() - Static method in class menuClases.MainMenu
Getter: returns the Menu in question
getMenuStack() - Method in class dataManagment.DMComponent
Getter: returns the stack of the Menu
getOriginCompany() - Method in class objects.Shares
Getter: returns originCompany Origin Company object of which the Shares were bought.
getPortfolio() - Method in class objects.Company
Getter: returns the ArrayList of Shares of this Company owned by Shareholders.
getPortfolio() - Method in class objects.Shareholder
Returns the list of Shares owned by this Shareholder.
getShareAmount() - Method in class objects.Shares
Getter: returns the amount of Shares bought by the Shareholder.
getShareOwner() - Method in class objects.Shares
Getter: returns Shareholder owner of the Shares.
getSharePrice() - Method in class objects.Company
Getter: Returns the price per Share of this Company.
getShares() - Method in class objects.Company
Getter: Returns the Amount of Shares this Company owns.
getSharesold() - Method in class objects.Company
Getter: returns the amount of Shares owned by Shareholders.
getShName() - Method in class objects.Shareholder
Getter: Returns The name of a Shareholder.
getStockSymbol() - Method in class objects.Company
Getter: Returns the Stock Symbol for this Company.
